title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 6, pt. 58 - Petitions For Exemption From Compliance With Provisions Of The Public Service Law
content:

State Regulations
§ 58.1 - Applicability of part
§ 58.2 - Contents of petition
§ 58.3 - Gas service to less than 20 customers
§ 58.4 - Gas service to 20 or more customers; electric, steam and water service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 6, pt. 58

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
